welcome.title: donumenta art goes VR / AR - dagva
welcome.p1: Art sites of contemporary interventions in the world heritage Regensburg
welcome.p2: Welcome to the augmented reality app
welcome.p3: In 2017, donumenta e.V. initiated the international Artist in Residence program (AiR) "HERITAGE TODAY/TOMORROW" for temporary interventions in public space in Regensburg. Since then, 4 to 5 international artists* come every year from the 14 countries of the Danube region and develop project ideas, which can be realized one year later in the public space in Regensburg.
welcome.p4: In this app you have the possibility to access the engagement of donumenta e.V. location-independent on the internet. After giving access to your location, you will be guided via GPS to the locations of temporary interventions. Once you have reached your destination, you can use the app to virtually bring back to life the artworks that have already been restored. Depending on the location, the menu shows one or more different 3D installations in AR layers.

description.warning: The Corona pandemic is not over yet - currently the number of new infections is rising again. Almost all infections are caused by the delta variant of the virus.
description.vaccination: The best protection against the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus is vaccination! Vaccination against COVID-19 is free of charge and available in many places.
description.protection: In addition, to prevent the further spread of the coronavirus, it is important,
description.p1: to follow the AHA formula: Keep your distance, observe hygiene, wear a mask - even on vacation,
description.p2: to meet with others preferably outdoors,
description.p4: avoid traveling to areas where the virus is present or where there is a high incidence of the virus, and
description.p5: comply with entry regulations after traveling abroad.
description.join: Join us - this is how you protect yourself and those around you!

donumenta.title: About donumenta
donumenta.description: Die donumenta steht für aktuelle Kunst aus 14 Ländern an der Donau: Multimedia, Performance, Installation, Fotografie, Malerei, Crossover – grenzenlos. Sie ist die Initiative ihrer künstlerischen Leiterin Regina-Hellwig-Schmid und wurde als Verein 2002 in Regensburg gegründet. Der donumenta e.V. macht Regensburg zur Drehscheibe des internationalen Kulturaustauschs entlang der Donau und trägt zum Profil der Welterbe-Stadt als Ort zeitgenössischer Kunst bei.

info.eta-lt-2min: Arrival in less than two minutes
